amendment.description: An amendment numbered 49 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to prohibit funds for the consideration of the Social Cost of Greenhouse Gases (SC-GHG) in the development and implementation of budgets, federal procurement processes, or environmental reviews.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.
